verses.name: Romans 8:17
verses.text: And if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ; if so be that we suffer with him, that we may be also glorified together.

verses.name: Romans 8:18
verses.text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.

verses.name: Romans 8:19
verses.text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God.

verses.name: Romans 8:20
verses.text: For the creature was made subject to vanity, not willingly, but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope,
